articles.description: The results show that textured surfaces impregnated with a lubricant were highly successful at preventing biofilm growth during their long exposure in space
articles.content: NEW YORK: A team of US scientists, led by one of Indian-origin, has developed a new kind of surface treatment that can significantly help reduce the growth of mats of microbial or fungal growth on th… [+3399 chars]
